com.sk89q.worldedit.regions

Class CylinderRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sk89q.worldedit.regions.AbstractRegion
      • com.sk89q.worldedit.regions.CylinderRegion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FlatRegion, Region, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<BlockVector>

    public class CylinderRegion
extends AbstractRegion
implements FlatRegion
    Represents a cylindrical region.
